mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, paternalSurname, maternalSurname, registrationDate, cellphoneNumber, password, oneTimePassword) VALUES (#{name}, #{paternalSurname}, #{maternalSurname}, #{registrationDate}, #{cellphoneNumber}, #{password}, #{oneTimePassword})
mapper.select: SELECT idUser, name, paternalSurname, maternalSurname, active, cellphoneNumber, password FROM user WHERE cellphoneNumber = #{cellphoneNumber}
SELECT idUser, name, paternalSurname, maternalSurname, active, cellphoneNumber, password FROM user WHERE cellphoneNumber = #{cellphoneNumber} AND password = #{password} AND active = (1)
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, paternalSurname = #{paternalSurname}, maternalSurname = #{maternalSurname}, password = #{password}, lastAccessToken = IFNULL(#{lastAccessToken}, lastAccessToken), lastAccessDate = IFNULL(#{lastAccessDate}, lastAccessDate) WHERE idUser = #{idUser}
